title: HSC's Senior Executive Officer for Finance & Administration announces plans to retire at end of 2022 - UNM Newsroom
content: HSC's Senior Executive Officer for Finance & Administration announces plans to retire at end of 2022  UNM Newsroom
description: “Doing the work and being a part of something that makes a difference is where the fun is.” This joy in advancing the operations and growth of The University of New Mexico has been a defining characteristic of Ava Lovell’s career. After nearly 28 years...
